mdRecord.dcterms:description: He has dislocated his wrist; appreciates Maury's interest in his daughter, who is in a convent where there are as many Protestants as Catholics and where all are free to profess and practice their religion; the convent is a house of education only where the menial tasks are performed by nuns.
